name: Erebyss
relicBonuses: After the bearer {ACTION_attacks} or is {ACTION_attacked}, it has a 50% chance to afflict the enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_FROZEN}.
Enemies deal 10% less damage to the bearer for each {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_FROZEN} enemy.
At the start of its bearer's turn, this relic {ACTION_attacks} a random enemy.
This relic and its bearer deal 35% more damage to {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_FROZEN} enemies.
After the bearer takes damage, this relic has a 25% chance to {ACTION_cast} [icons,1980]Black Ice.
After the bearer afflicts an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_FROZEN}, this relic has a 25% chance to {ACTION_cast} [icons,1980]Shatter on it.
After the bearer takes damage, this relic increases its {STAT_defense} by 20%.
At the end of its bearer's turn, this relic {ACTION_casts} [icons,1976]Snowstorm.
title: Goddess of Darkness
